Must try when visit Korea

Café
" Everyone knows Seoul as a shopping paradise, a haven for fashion, cosmetics, and technology. However, you might not know that Seoul is also a "coffee paradise" with charming and unique coffee shops. "
Restaurants
" Korean restaurants and eateries always offers tourists a unique and unforgettable gastronomic experience. So where is the beloved destination for boba fide “foodies”? Almost everyone knows - the nation famous for its popular Kdramas, renowned cosmestics brands, and top-notch music industry. Alongside its fame in those areas, the culinary scene is also one of the main attractions drawing tourists from all over the world. "

Tips for tourists

Transportation

Korea's transportation system is known for its efficiency and extensive coverage. With a well-developed network of subways, buses, and trains, navigating cities and traveling between regions is convenient...

K

O

Hotel - Room

There's something for everyone, from luxurious five-star establishments in bustling cities to cozy guesthouses in rural areas. Combining modern amenities with traditional Korean hospitality, these hotels ensure visitors a comfortable and memorable stay.

Communication

Communication and language in Korea blend tradition with modernity. Korean is the primary language, with increasing English proficiency, especially among the younger generation...

R

E

Aviation

South Korea's airport system is modern and efficient, with Incheon International Airport near Seoul being one of the busiest and most advanced globally. Gimpo International Airport serves as a hub for domestic flights.

Emergency

To prepare for unexpected emergencies during your trip to South Korea, read and store the following essential information to protect yourself or your travel companions. Prioritize knowledge of hospitals and police stations at your destination
